EmailTemplate.subject: Marathon Run.......Mr Adam Hoult
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Parents, This weekend, our very own Physical Education teacher, Mr Adam Hoult, will be attempting to "TRY and Complete" the Moscow Marathon. Mr Hoult is "putting his body on the line" for a great cause....... A charity known as "Get Kids Going". It would be great if our wonderful school community could get behind Adam (May need a push or three) and sponsor him in his efforts. I have placed a link below. There you will find a description of the charity and how to sponsor Adam. www.justgiving.com/adam-hoult Hoping for a great response!!! Best Regards Dino VikasHead of Admissions The International School of Moscow Tel: +7 (499) 922 44 00 Fax: +7 (499) 922 44 00 Ext.4 www.internationalschool.ru Part of The British Schools Group
